alert.note: Alert for Barton; Ellsworth; Lincoln; Rice; Russell; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 10:48PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lincoln, northwestern Rice, Ellsworth, southern Russell, Barton and northwestern Saline Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1048 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sylvan Grove to 7 miles north of Wilson to 5 miles east of Russell to near Pfeifer. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. As these storms passed the Russell airport, a gust to 48 mph was observed. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Great Bend, Ellsworth, Hoisington, Ellinwood, Wilson, Claflin, Kanopolis, Lincoln, Holyrood, Bushton, Geneseo, Brookville, Dorrance, Beverly, Lorraine, Barnard, Milberger, Glendale, Bunker Hill and Galatia. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 187 and 249. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Barton; Ellsworth; Lincoln; Rice; Russell; Saline
